mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tl_pod (uuid, rc_uuid, svc_uuid, name, namespace, hostIP, podIP, restartCount, image, status, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{uuid}, #{rc_uuid}, #{svc_uuid}, #{name}, #{namespace}, #{hostIP}, #{podIP}, #{restartCount}, #{image}, #{status},#{create_time}, #{update_time})
